method.name: difference_polygons
method.description: Returns the difference of two polygons to an Array containing two PackedVector2Arrays, the subject at [0] and the clip at [1].

method.name: intersect_polygons
method.description: Returns the intersection of two polygons to an Array containing two PackedVector2Arrays, the subject at [0] and the clip at [1].

method.name: union_polygons
method.description: Returns the union of two polygons to an Array containing two PackedVector2Arrays, the subject at [0] and the clip at [1].

method.name: xor_polygons
method.description: Returns the XOR of two polygons to an Array containing two PackedVector2Arrays, the subject at [0] and the clip at [1].
